subtests.name: mouse pointerevent attributes
mouse pointerover's type should be pointerover
mouse pointerover's button is -1 when mouse buttons are in released state.
mouse pointerover's buttons is 0 when mouse buttons are in released state.
mouse pointerover's ClientX and ClientY attributes are correct.
mouse pointerover.pointerType is correct.
mouse pointerover event is a PointerEvent event
mouse pointerover.fromElement value is null
mouse pointerover.toElement value is null
mouse pointerover.isTrusted value is true
mouse pointerover.composed value is valid
mouse pointerover.bubbles value is valid
mouse pointerover.cancelable value is valid
mouse pointerover.pressure value is valid
mouse pointerover properties for pointerType = mouse
mouse pointerover.isPrimary attribute is correct.
mouse pointerenter's type should be pointerenter
mouse pointerenter's button is -1 when mouse buttons are in released state.
mouse pointerenter's buttons is 0 when mouse buttons are in released state.
mouse pointerenter's ClientX and ClientY attributes are correct.
mouse pointerenter.pointerType is correct.
mouse pointerenter event is a PointerEvent event
mouse pointerenter.fromElement value is null
mouse pointerenter.toElement value is null
mouse pointerenter.isTrusted value is true
mouse pointerenter.composed value is valid
mouse pointerenter.bubbles value is valid
mouse pointerenter.cancelable value is valid
mouse pointerenter.pressure value is valid
mouse pointerenter properties for pointerType = mouse
mouse pointerenter.isPrimary attribute is correct.
mouse pointerenter.pointerId should be the same as previous pointer events for this active pointer.
